pleasAllocation.additionalInformation: We at the EE solicitors LLC require 24 hoursn notice prior to any information being sent to our client. We will engage and respond between 24 hours
pleasAllocation.consentToMagistratesCourtTrial: Elects trial at the Crown Court
pleasAllocation.electingCrownCourtTrialDetails: We would prefer the court considers the allocation prior to the client electing the Crown court services.
pleasAllocation.theftFromShopDetails: I agree these klow level shoplifting is too negligible to warrant a public hearing and as such should not be considered an issue in this case
